<h3 id="X31788">X(31788) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: HEXYL AND INTOUCH</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*((b+c)*a^5-(b^2+c^2)*a^4-2*(b+c)*(b^2-3*b*c+c^2)*a^3+2*(b^2-3*b*c+c^2)*(b+c)^2*a^2+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(b^2-4*b*c+c^2)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31788) = 3*X(3)+X(25413) = X(4)-3*X(3753) = 5*X(10)-3*X(15064) = 3*X(10)-X(31803) = 3*X(40)-X(7957) = 3*X(65)+X(7957) = X(72)-3*X(5657) = 3*X(165)+X(5903) = 3*X(165)-X(14110) = 3*X(210)-X(5693) = 3*X(354)-X(7982) = 3*X(354)-5*X(15016) = 3*X(392)-5*X(631) = 3*X(549)-2*X(31838) = X(944)-3*X(10167) = 5*X(3617)-X(12528) = 5*X(3617)-3*X(18908) = 5*X(5777)-6*X(15064) = 3*X(5777)-2*X(31803) = 3*X(10167)+X(10914) = X(12528)-3*X(18908) = 9*X(15064)-5*X(31803)</b>
<p>X(31788) lies on these lines:
{1,3}, {2,12672}, {4,3753}, {5,1538}, {10,5777}, {72,5657}, {84,9623}, {100,17654}, {210,5693}, {355,971}, {392,631}, {497,12700}, {515,5836}, {516,3754}, {518,5884}, {519,12675}, {549,31838}, {573,21866}, {581,4646}, {912,5690}, {936,7971}, {944,10167}, {946,3812}, {952,13369}, {958,1158}, {960,2800}, {962,6865}, {1012,19860}, {1210,15845}, {1329,12608}, {1376,6261}, {1413,21147}, {1490,1706}, {1519,4187}, {1532,24982}, {1737,15908}, {1753,1905}, {1768,5258}, {1770,11827}, {1829,6197}, {1902,7412}, {2771,12665}, {2801,3626}, {2818,5909}, {2886,12616}, {3085,12709}, {3555,12245}, {3617,12528}, {3679,14872}, {3698,5587}, {3740,20117}, {3869,27383}, {3880,5882}, {3901,15104}, {3918,19925}, {3922,31822}, {3925,9956}, {4002,5818}, {4301,13374}, {4303,24028}, {5044,5887}, {5082,5768}, {5178,9803}, {5440,21740}, {5554,6925}, {5687,18446}, {5720,9709}, {5780,8580}, {5790,9947}, {5806,12699}, {5814,18909}, {5828,11678}, {5854,15528}, {5880,26332}, {5881,12680}, {5886,28629}, {6259,10309}, {6745,14988}, {6796,15813}, {6864,11024}, {6882,9955}, {6906,17613}, {6913,12705}, {6927,26062}, {6928,22793}, {6932,25005}, {6958,11230}, {6975,17618}, {7330,9708}, {7680,12609}, {9841,12650}, {9845,11525}, {10107,31730}, {11500,12520}, {12119,17636}, {14647,19843}</p>
<p>
X(31788) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {40, 65}, {100, 17654}, {942, 31798}, {944, 10914}, {1770, 11827}, {3555, 12245}, {5836, 9943}, {5881, 12680}, {5884, 11362}, {5903, 14110}, {12119, 17636}, {12667, 17649}, {12702, 24474}, {14872, 15071}, {31794, 31797}<br>
X(31788) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1, 9940), (3, 31787), (946, 3812), (960, 6684), (1482, 5045), (4301, 13374), (5777, 10), (5887, 5044), (7686, 3754), (9856, 5), (9957, 1385), (12699, 5806), (12702, 31797), (13600, 1), (19925, 3918), (23340, 31792), (24474, 31794), (24680, 13373), (25405, 18856), (31786, 3), (31793, 3579)<br>
X(31788) = complement of X(12672)<br>
X(31788) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (40, 7982, 7994), (6769, 11529, 1482), (7982, 15016, 354)<br>
